title: Troy Ave Interivew and More
itunes:title: Troy Ave Interivew and More
description:
Monday 2/12- Today on the show we had "New Pac" or better known as Troy Ave, who stopped "The Breakfast Club" did not waste any time when asking him about his song "2 Legit 2 Quit" and the meaning behind it, his growth, taking responsibilities for his actions and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Christian Fauria for using a fake Asian accent to mock Tom Brady’s agent. Moreover, after Amber Rose posted a picture of her 5 year old son's new hair color, we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought of her as parent bleaching her child's hair. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Monday 2/12- Today on the show we had "New Pac" or better known as Troy Ave, who stopped "The Breakfast Club" did not waste any time when asking him about his song "2 Legit 2 Quit" and the meaning behind it, his growth, taking responsibilities for his actions and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Christian Fauria for using a fake Asian accent to mock Tom Brady’s agent. Moreover, after Amber Rose posted a picture of her 5 year old son's new hair color, we opened up the phone lines to see what our listeners thought of her as parent bleaching her child's hair.
